messages.message: Do we support spreadsheets in Builder? I can't seem to get any responses for this one
Really need to change the csv viewer to use light mode -- is that tracked anywhere @avi?
and @vineeth on if build support spreadsheet. if not we should block uploading CSV files for now until we support it
We support it for chat mode, but we use a different way to handle it. I’ll let @Prashant Kikani add here
csv viewer theming is tracked
As of now, we only support CSV files in Converse app.
Should we not allow CSV file upload in Builder?
Or have an error message?
@Prashant Kikani @vineeth how much work is it to support CSV files in Builder? And, can we compile a list of files that Converse support but not Build?

Ideally we support the same set of files in both files, but I understand there's a lot of different priorities right now; until we do support something, we should block people from using file types not supported. Whatever types the build app don't support, we need to also block / explain that in the app running screen
I’ll let Prashant comment on the effort, but looking at the closeness to launch date, it would be wise to not support csv for build mode atleast
@avi btw i'm curious -- did you get a classification result from the CSV you upload?

We might have to modify the class/field suggest APIs and extraction APIs also.
Class is Unknown and extraction is failing...
I did, but was using a generic class "Document" :slightly_smiling_face: So not the best example
yeah let's wait for it then :slightly_smiling_face:
let’s disable csvs
Besides CSV and XLS, anything else the we should block in Build @Prashant Kikani @vineeth?
No those are the only other ones, btw xlsx is not supported on chat also perfectly like csv
PPT? Not sure though...

> btw xlsx is not supported on chat also perfectly like csv
Yes, we are thinking of handling `xlsx` as CSV files as of now...
Anything the digitize endpoint handles and creates ibdoc minus (csv, xlsx) - cc @Vasu on what file formats digitize handles
ok great, thanks team -- let's block the spreadsheet types for build mode and app running
Currently, we support upload and digitization of `pdf,png,jpeg,jpg,tif,tiff,xlsx,docx,pptx,msg,eml,csv,txt,html,mht,mhtml`  file formats.
thank you!

> Anything the digitize endpoint handles and creates ibdoc minus (csv, xlsx)
@vineeth In the code, I only see csv being skipped from digitization, not xlsx.
@aristo fyi, these are the filetypes supported
Okay my bad, I thought there was new plans to skip it for xlsx too before launch and do it the same way we do it for csv @Aayush @Prashant Kikani can confirm

@Aayush suggested to convert `xlsx` files to CSV files in the conversion service. So, model-service would get CSV as an input and will be handled just like normal CSV. And front-end will also get CSV file only - so it'll use CSV-viewer to show in UI

For reference (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/b8110ebde7c0783345310d60675d8bab3dde684b/shared-utils/py-utils/flow-lib/src/py/instabase/flow_lib/flow_types.py#L707)
cc @Gaurav Saini
